title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet: 3 Ways to Swap to Your Pokémon's Hidden Ability

steps.title: Complete 6- or 7-Star Tera Raid Battles.
steps.content: Complete 6- or 7-Star Tera Raid Battles. Ability Patches are items that allow you to change a Pokémon's Ability into one of its Hidden Abilities, and the only way to get them is to finish 6- or 7-Star Tera Raid Battles . These are some of the hardest fights in the game, so make sure you prepare accordingly.

steps.title: Open your bag.
steps.content: Open your bag. After getting an Ability Patch, open your bag and navigate to the item.

steps.title: Apply the Ability Patch to the Pokémon of your choice.
steps.content: Apply the Ability Patch to the Pokémon of your choice. While Ability Patches can be used on any Pokémon, their rarity and difficulty in obtaining means that most players save them for special Pokémon, such as shinies or legendaries. Ability Patches can only be used on Pokémon that have Hidden Abilities. For example, you cannot use one on a Metapod because they can only have the ability Shed Skin. [1] X Research source If a Pokémon has their Ability changed into a Hidden Ability, they will retain a Hidden Ability when evolving.

steps.title: Join a 6- or 7-Star Tera Raid Battle.
steps.content: Join a 6- or 7-Star Tera Raid Battle. Pokémon caught in 6- or 7-Star Tera Raid Battles have a higher chance of having their Hidden Ability. These are some of the hardest fights in the game, so make sure you prepare accordingly. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Catch the Pokémon once the raid is over.
steps.content: Catch the Pokémon once the raid is over. Note that if you're completing a 7-Star Tera Raid Battle, the Pokémon you catch can only be caught once. 6-Star Tera Raid Battles, however, do not have this restriction, so if you get the wrong Ability, you can try again.

steps.title: Obtain a Pokémon with the Hidden Ability you want.
steps.content: Obtain a Pokémon with the Hidden Ability you want. While this method doesn't work if you have zero Pokémon with Hidden Abilities, it works if you're trying to breed more Pokémon with a specific Hidden Ability for better IVs and you have one already.

steps.title: Obtain a Ditto without a Hidden Ability.
steps.content: Obtain a Ditto without a Hidden Ability. Alternatively, if the Pokémon you have with the Hidden Ability is a female, you can breed her with a male of her same species.

steps.title: Breed the Pokémon and hatch the resulting egg.
steps.content: Breed the Pokémon and hatch the resulting egg. You can now reliably produce multiple Pokémon with their Hidden Ability, either for getting perfect IVs or for sending to friends.
